SEARCH
Package lib

Class Member

java.lang.Object
lib.Person
lib.Member
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
public class Member extends Person
This class defines a subclass of Person abstract class describing a library member

It defines a unique id field for the member along with a map containing the books that hav been borrowed by this member and have not been returned yet

See Also:
  • Person
  • Gender
  • Book
  • HashMap

    • Member

      public Member(String name, Gender gender, String id)
      The constructor for member object. It calls the constructor of the upper-class Person to set the name and gender values It also assigns an ID to the object
      Parameters:
      name - name of the member
      gender - gender of the member
      id - unique ID of the member
